articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Apple changes Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America based on Trump's order - ABC News
articles.description: Apple has changed the name of the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America on its maps after an order by President Donald Trump was made official by the U.S. Geographic Names Information System
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO -- Apple renamed the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America on its maps Tuesday after an order by President Donald Trump was made official by the U.S. Geographic Names Information System… [+839 chars]

articles.title: NATO allies await US defense secretary's visit, the first by a member of the Trump administration - The Associated Press
articles.description: U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth will become on Wednesday the first member of the new Trump administration to visit NATO. European allies and Canada are keen to understand how America now plans to influence the war in Ukraine. Hegseth will take part in a m…
